creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: rug, dark blue field carrying two vases flanked by stylized pale blue peacocks at the ends; stylized flowers spring from the vases and are scattered throughout the field; small, stiffly drawn animals appear at intervals; three borders, the main one carrying a running flower and leaf design in shades of blue on a red ground; pile worn to warp in places; cotton warp; Selma knot; woven fabric
title: Rug with vases and peacocks
